The sun blazed down on the sleepy town of Frostville when suddenly, dark clouds rolled in. Instead of rain, the townsfolk were greeted with a shower of colorful ice cream! Scoops of chocolate, strawberry, and mint swirled down, covering the streets in a sweet, creamy blanket. Children danced and laughed, catching the falling treats in their hands. Old Mr. Thompson, the town's grump, stepped outside, his frown melting away as he caught a scoop on his tongue. As the townspeople savored the unexpected delight, they realized that sometimes, even the most ordinary days could be transformed into a magical celebration.
